detectors.description: Variable OnePiece._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#101) is not in mixedCase

	- _totalSupply = 400000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#110)
